Reviews.Title: good specification  and price /but GPS and restart problem
Reviews.Author: AHMED JASSM
Reviews.Content: this phone has very good camera and specification but this phone restart when you turn on the GPS or when you make call until now i was try every  think to fix this issue. now docomo company release new update for this phone 4.1.2 (V19R50D) they were said this update will solve this issue (restart problem)  but if you outside japan you can't update your phone.my advice for you if you want to buy this phone should be check if the new update it's relay solve restart problem and ask from sealer to update your phone to last version (4.1.2 V19R50D) before shipping to you.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Avinash
Reviews.Content: Overall Performance is Good,. only thing is Camera wont take good picks in Dim Light and the Focus is Not upto the mark.,but other features are Awesome.. It Looks SexyI just Loved it..
